page.title: 08BASSINGBOURN SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content:
We did a survey of 65 families in Bassingbourn about their life in the village, 127 of the parents replied. 5 {were born here 122 {were not}(22 in London) This table shows how many families came here within the past- {1yr/ 1-2yr/ 2-5yr/ 5-10yr/ 10+yr/ 8 7 9 19 21
35 families said they would stay here 21 said not and 9 were not sure. Parents work in{village/barracks/other { }28 13 51 This should mean 924 429 1683 for all of Bassingbourn. We made a count of how many people use different places for shopping. 75 use the village, 1975 use Royston, 875 use Cambridge, 175 use Letchworth, 25 use Baldock, 100 use Hitchin and 650 use Stevenage.
